Error: --title, --date, --time, and --duration are required fields. Error: Invalid date format "10-10-2023". Please use YYYY-MM-DD. Error: Invalid time format "2 PM". Please use HH:MM. 1 events found conflicted with the new event. - "Meeting" (2023-10-10T14:00 -> 2023-10-10T15:30)
Consider using calctl --force option to add anyway. Unexpected space between numbers and units Error: Invalid duration format "90 minutes". Please use Ww Dd Hh Mm.
